005package edu.wpi.first.hal.can;
006
007import edu.wpi.first.hal.communication.NIRioStatus;
008import edu.wpi.first.hal.util.UncleanStatusException;
009
010public final class CANExceptionFactory {
011  // FRC Error codes
012  static final int ERR_CANSessionMux_InvalidBuffer = -44086;
013  static final int ERR_CANSessionMux_MessageNotFound = -44087;
014  static final int ERR_CANSessionMux_NotAllowed = -44088;
015  static final int ERR_CANSessionMux_NotInitialized = -44089;
016
017  @SuppressWarnings("MissingJavadocMethod")
018  public static void checkStatus(int status, int messageID)
019      throws CANInvalidBufferException, CANMessageNotAllowedException, CANNotInitializedException,
020          UncleanStatusException {
021    switch (status) {
022      case NIRioStatus.kRioStatusSuccess:
023        // Everything is ok... don't throw.
024        return;
025      case ERR_CANSessionMux_InvalidBuffer:
026      case NIRioStatus.kRIOStatusBufferInvalidSize:
027        throw new CANInvalidBufferException();
028      case ERR_CANSessionMux_MessageNotFound:
029      case NIRioStatus.kRIOStatusOperationTimedOut:
030        throw new CANMessageNotFoundException();
031      case ERR_CANSessionMux_NotAllowed:
032      case NIRioStatus.kRIOStatusFeatureNotSupported:
033        throw new CANMessageNotAllowedException("MessageID = " + messageID);
034      case ERR_CANSessionMux_NotInitialized:
035      case NIRioStatus.kRIOStatusResourceNotInitialized:
036        throw new CANNotInitializedException();
037      default:
038        throw new UncleanStatusException("Fatal status code detected:  " + status);
039    }
040  }
041
042  private CANExceptionFactory() {}
043}
